message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to us, but we understand its value to you might be around $100. We're willing to start the negotiation at $150 for this exceptional item. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120. This aligns more closely with my assessment of the product's worth. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
